item.description:
Join us for The Bernadette's, Primetime and What Up Funk!!


This is a fundraiser for Alex a 13 year old boy with Myelodysplastic Syndrome/Aplastic Anemia, a rare blood disorder. He is currently awaiting a Bone Marrow Transplant. And he needs our help.


Leon’s is proud to be the site for this extraordinary fund raising event. It will be an evening to remember for a long, long time. We will be serving a buffet--including appetizers, pasta stations and desserts. There will be raffle prizes and a cash bar. And there will be live entertainment--LOTS of it--by The Bernadettes, PrimeTime and What Up Funk.

Never again will you get so much value for your $40 donation to such a worthy cause.

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: 3 GREAT BANDS IN ONE NIGHT @ LEON'S FOR A FUNDRAISER!!
